job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Machine Learning Engineer / Remote

 

Do want to be part one of the most innovative Machine Learning teams at an internationally leading technology company?


Yes? Read on. . .


This enterprise generates over 6 billion Euros annually and operates in niche areas within Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Optical Technology. 

 

In this role, you'll work alongside the best. Driving the algorithmic development of cutting edge digital products, in a diverse team of scientists and researchers.

 

You'll also have freedom to design new visions and prototypes for a varied consumer products roadmap.


To be a good fit, you’ll need:

 

  • Extensive experience with applied machine leaning research, preferably computational imaging.
  • Proficiency in Python TensorFlow, and PyTorch.
  • A great knowledge of image/video processing (Neural style transfer. Image fusion)

 

This is great opportunity to work in a highly collaborative environment, In a spacious modern setting, with lots of opportunities for further development.
